msg.msgText:
The values of the configuration items of the "SNMPTrapSubscriber" can be obtained by using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver show SNMPTrapSubscriber help imaserver show SNMPTrapSubscriber "Host=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver show SNMPTrapSubscriber "Host=9.3.179.144"
The following configuration items are returned: Host Host of the SNMP trap subscriber. ClientPortNumber The port number for SNMP trap subscriber host. Community The SNMP community.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
